foods.recipe: A cheeseburger is a classic American dish made with a ground beef patty, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments such as ketchup and mustard. It is typically served on a bun.
A hot dog is a popular American street food made with a grilled or steamed sausage served in a sliced bun. It is often topped with mustard, ketchup, onions, relish, and other condiments.

Fried chicken is a Southern American specialty made by coating chicken pieces with seasoned flour or breadcrumbs and deep-frying them until crispy and golden. It is often served with mashed potatoes, coleslaw, and biscuits.
BBQ ribs are a popular American barbecue dish made with pork or beef ribs coated in a tangy and smoky barbecue sauce. They are slow-cooked over low heat until tender and flavorful.
Mac and cheese is a comforting American dish made with macaroni pasta and a creamy cheese sauce. It is often baked with additional cheese on top for a crispy and gooey texture.
Buffalo wings are spicy chicken wings that are deep-fried and coated in a tangy hot sauce made with hot peppers and butter. They are often served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.
Apple pie is a classic American dessert made with a flaky pastry crust and a filling of sliced apples, sugar, and spices. It is often served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
A hamburger is a classic American sandwich made with a ground beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments such as ketchup and mustard. It is typically served on a bun.
Clam chowder is a creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, celery, and bacon in a rich broth. It is a popular New England dish, often served in a bread bowl.
Pancakes are a breakfast staple in America, made with a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and sugar, cooked on a hot griddle or pan. They are often served with maple syrup and butter.
Cornbread is a traditional American quick bread made with cornmeal. It has a slightly sweet and crumbly texture and is often served as a side dish with chili, barbecue, or fried chicken.
New York-style pizza is a thin-crust pizza with a hand-tossed dough that is typically topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and various toppings. It is known for its large, foldable slices.
